On August 28, 2025, Cipla announced the completion of two corporate developments: the acquisition of a stake in iCaltech Innovations and a product recall in the US .

Corporate developments

Completes 20% stake acquisition in iCaltech Innovations:Cipla announced that it had closed the acquisition of a 20% stake in Bengaluru-based medical device maker iCaltech Innovations Pvt Ltd. The deal, valued at approximately â‚¹5 crore, gives Cipla a minority holding and reinforces its presence in the respiratory care and diagnostics sector.

Voluntary product recall in the US:An arm of Cipla, Cipla USA Inc., is voluntarily recalling over 20,000 packs of Ibuterol Sulfate Inhalation Aerosol in the US market. The product is a medication used to treat asthma and certain types of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease.
